item.title: 2 very simple scar scripts, WakTheSak and Reflex *edited*
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

They’re ok, but i sligthly outscored you with my script:

1. Freddy1990 19 2006-07-13 12:29:59 0:0:45 2. Matte 56 2006-07-11 18:38:36 0:14:3 3. Saml 163 2006-07-11 15:58:52 0:4:3

program New; begin repeat if(GetColor(346, 278) = 65535)then ClickMouse(346, 278, True); until(False) end.
1- It’s alot smaller.
2- It only needs to check 1 pixel and not search half of the gamescreen.

item.title: 2 very simple scar scripts, WakTheSak and Reflex *edited*
item.dc:creator: @sk84lifesam sk84lifesam
item.description:
@sk84lifesam wrote:

[code]{for the game
http://www.go-skateboarding.com/USERIMAGES/wakthesak[1].swf
written by Saml}

Program WAKtheSAK;
const
a=0;

Procedure clickstart;
Begin
movemouse(609,364); //if you want to play on a diffrent site the window will be a diffrent size so you will need to change these coordinates
ClickMouse(609,364,true); //and here
end;

procedure Wak;
Begin;
MoveMouseSmooth(632,237); //and here
HoldMouse(632,237,true); //and here
MoveMouseSmooth(57,183); //and here
ReleaseMouse(57,183,true); //you can guess what im gonna say
wait(6000);
end;

procedure playagain;
Begin;
movemouse(358,298) //and here
clickmouse(358,298,true) //and here
end;

begin
clickstart;
wak;
repeat
until a<4;
playagain;
wak;
repeat
until a<4;
end.[/code]

[code]// Script created for game:
// http://igol.be/index.php?option=com_mamboflashgames&Itemid=999&task=view&catid=0&id=58
// by Saml
// but can be used for most simple games (kickups,shooting games etc
program colourclicker;
var x,y:integer;
const
wete = 5 //change this wait time, to not get such an unrealistic time

begin
repeat
if(findcolorTolerance(x,y,65535,0,0,690,500,5))then
begin
MoveMouse(x,y);
wait(wete)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
until(false)
end. [/code]

Read full topic
